line_1: He loves command and due restriction,
line_2: And she as well likes contradiction;

line_1: E'er sin' they laid that curst restriction
line_2: Tell them wha hae the chief direction,

line_1: E'er sin' they laid that curst restriction
line_2: Scotland an' me's in great affliction,

line_1: E'er sin' they laid that curst restriction
line_2: An' rouse them up to strong conviction,
